description: Try this luscious rum cocktail if you want to ring in the new year with something more special than champagne. It is a perfect drink for people who prefer elegant yet simple celebrations.
name: Driven Snow

recipeInstructions.name: Dip the rim of a glass in water, then in finely crushed candy canes.
recipeInstructions.text: Dip the rim of a glass in water, then in finely crushed candy canes.

recipeInstructions.name: Combine white chocolate liqueur, blackstrap rum, ginger liqueur, and ice in a cocktail shaker.

recipeInstructions.name: Shake well until well combined, then strain into the glass.
